title: The Exorcist
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

title: The Sting
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay Based on Factual Material or Material Not Previously Published or Produced
Best Music, Scoring Original Song Score and/or Adaptation
description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: American Graffiti
description: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

title: Papillon
description: A man wrongly convicted of murder and sentenced to life in a brutal penal colony is determined to escape.

title: Live and Let Die
description: James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

title: Serpico
description: The true story of an honest New York cop who blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force, only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: Mean Streets
description: A small-time hood aspires to work his way up the ranks of a local mob.

title: Badlands
description: A young couple goes on a crime spree in the American Midwest in the 1950s.

title: Day for Night
description: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of personal and professional problems.

title: Amarcord
description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a small Italian town in the 1930s.

title: Enter the Dragon
description: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

title: Paper Moon
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

title: The Day of the Jackal
description: A professional assassin is hired to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

title: Don't Look Now
description: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

title: The Wicker Man
description: A police sergeant is sent to a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl whom the townsfolk claim never existed.

title: Sleeper
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: A nerdy jazz musician who is cryogenically frozen in 1973 wakes up 200 years later in a dystopian future.

title: High Plains Drifter
description: A mysterious stranger is hired to protect a corrupt mining town from a trio of vengeful outlaws.

title: Westworld
description: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

title: The Last Detail
description: Two Navy men are ordered to escort a young offender to prison, but they decide to show him one last good time along the way.

title: Charley Varrick
description: A small-time bank robber finds himself in over his head when he robs a bank that the Mafia uses for money laundering.

title: Scarecrow
description: Two drifters, an ex-con and a former sailor, team up to start a car wash business in Pittsburgh.

title: Pat Garrett and Billy the Kid
description: The story of the complex relationship between the legendary outlaw and the lawman who was once his friend.

title: The Long Goodbye
description: A private eye in 1970s Los Angeles is drawn into a web of intrigue when he tries to help a friend who has been accused of murder.

title: Scenes from a Marriage
description: A look at the ups and downs of a marriage over the course of a decade.

title: Soylent Green
description: In a dystopian future, a New York City detective investigates the murder of a wealthy businessman and uncovers a terrifying secret.

title: The Paper Chase
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A first-year law student at Harvard University clashes with his brilliant but demanding contracts professor.

title: Magnum Force
description: Dirty Harry is on the hunt for a group of vigilante cops who are killing criminals.

title: The Way We Were
description: The story of an unlikely couple's love affair, from their college days in the 1930s to the McCarthy era.

title: A Touch of Class
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A married American man and a divorced English woman have an affair in London.

title: Save the Tiger
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A successful but disillusioned clothing manufacturer has a moral crisis.

title: The Spook Who Sat by the Door
description: The first black man to be recruited by the CIA uses his training to start a black nationalist guerrilla movement.

title: The Holy Mountain
description: A Christ-like figure wanders through a surreal, symbolic landscape on a quest for enlightenment.

title: F for Fake
description: A documentary about the nature of truth and illusion, focusing on the lives of art forger Elmyr de Hory and his biographer, Clifford Irving.

title: The Friends of Eddie Coyle
description: An aging gunrunner for the Boston mob is facing a lengthy prison sentence and has to decide whether to snitch on his friends.

title: Sisters
description: A journalist witnesses a murder in the apartment across the street and becomes convinced that the killer is the twin sister of a successful model.

title: Day of the Dolphin
description: A scientist who has trained dolphins to communicate with humans finds his work being co-opted by a shadowy government agency.

title: Coffy
description: A nurse takes vigilante justice against the drug dealers who are responsible for her sister's addiction.

title: Lady Snowblood
description: A young woman is trained from birth to be a deadly assassin in order to avenge the deaths of her family.

title: Jesus Christ Superstar
description: A rock opera that tells the story of the final week in the life of Jesus Christ.

title: Godspell
description: A musical based on the Gospel of St. Matthew, set in modern-day New York City.

title: The Mack
description: An ex-convict returns to his Oakland neighborhood and becomes a powerful pimp.
